messages: update to v1.59.4 to make sure most of the stuff is working correctly for 0.3
!!!reset!!! your guide-slot by long-clicking the <reset> button in order to get the latest guide version
if you previously edited the guide, you have to reset via the editor
as of writing this, the pob update hasn't shipped yet. once that is out, i'll implement support for the tree. the tree will auto-download when importing new builds
gem-features (overlays, regex) should work as long as you're using a build with 0.2 gems
